articles.description: Jamie Lee Curtis mourned the death of Eagles co-founding member and bassist Randy Meisner, who died at the age of 77 this week from chronic obstructive...
articles.content:
Eagles co-founding member Randy Meisner is being remembered by former bandmates after he died at the age of 77 Wednesday.
The Eagles
